Or, call 1-800-Medicare (1-800-633-4227) to get the telephone number. TTY users should call 1-877-486-2048. To find out about Medigap policies, visit http://www.medicare.gov to view a copy of ""Choosing a Medigap Policy: A Guide to Health Insurance for People with Medicare.""
